casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Norfolk Junior BEST 300A93-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2018 Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Michael L. Unti, Raleigh, Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, Erica W. Washington, Attorneys at Law, for Best, Norfolk Junior The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of March 2018 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 24th day of July, 2018 to file his/ her Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of March 2018." Ervin, J., recused
